transcript: I saw a post a girl made and she was like you are worthy you are amazing you are a goddess and I was like you're not a goddess cuz you don't control me and you don't have the things that you want you keep thinking that you saying that you're worthy is going to somehow make it true the way that you know you're worthy is that you have it it's just giving yourself permission to suck it's giving yourself permission to be unhappy it's giving yourself permission to not achieve all you do for a long period of time it's giving yourself permission to lose friends it's giving yourself permission to do things that's different than people in your Social Circle or your age group or doing giving yourself permission to be an exception so that you can become exceptional
